attributes.action: end the teaching of evolution theory in schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Evolution is taught in schools as if it is fact, despite the fact that there is no definitive proof that we share a common ancestry with apes.

This teaching should be halted as it is unproven. Creationism should be given equal precidence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
